%JUNIT_HOME%\junit.jar;%JUNIT_HOME%

and, I have problem running the junit.samples.AllTests. Here is the
error message.

The class, junit.tests.runner.LoadedFromJar, is definitely under %
JUNIT_HOME%\junit\test\runner. In fact, some other classes under that

incorrect/incomplete classpath can cause this kind of behavior. By
the way, I am using 3.8.1.

Thanks for the help
